# The `MipsCallLowering.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Handle cases when f64 is split into 2 32-bit GPRs. This is a custom</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="comment">/// assignment because generic code assumes getNumRegistersForCallingConv is</Highlight></CodeLine>
